t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm not sure where any of the Palace of Eternity folks are.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: What I mean is where's either Kaguya, Eirin, or Reisen?
I'm sorry to say. They are not here right now, which is why the palace has been empty.
But what do I need to say? I'll enjoy seeing people dance in this!

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Speaking of dance, this hairstyle would be perfect for a masquerade ball.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It's bad enough for anxious people though!

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Or better yet: Why aren't you also affected like that one siren I fought earlier?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm not anxious in any way. I'm blessed to see this!

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If I ever saw Hatate, she would look hideous.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I can't sleep because my hair will get tangled in my surroundings!

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Yeah... that's what happens when you have hair like this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: The only good thing is it keeps you warmer in the winter.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: But to me, my magic protects my body from such enchantments.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That might be true but look at my state.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I shocked myself upon first sight, and even woodblock prints don't help my appearance.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm no longer my traditional self.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That's what happens with a big transformation that was placed upon this land.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I heard this may have started here.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It may have been only intended for one person, but it instead affected everyone!

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That wasn't the case. Somebody came to Gensokyo and here to conduct this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Somebody? Where? What kind of magic did they use for this!?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I won't tell, but you are stuck like this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I don't want to look like someone who emerged from the radioactive depths of Mount Komeiji.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm assuming that Reimu also looks hideous as well.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Because you originally had short hair, you were never attractive.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Wrong! I am no matter what! I'll take you on and see how much damage I do!
